title: Emotional Manipulation Patterns
core_mechanism: Emotional framing is used to bypass logic, disable critical assessment, and control responses through guilt, fear, or manufactured empathy.

patterns.label: Empathy Override
examples: How can you be so heartless?
patterns.tactic: Weaponizes emotional expectations to undermine logic-based conclusions.

patterns.label: Moral Panic Anchoring
patterns.tactic: Introduces high-emotion symbols to trigger bypass of rational analysis.

patterns.label: Discomfort Framing
patterns.tactic: Implies that truth or logic causing emotional reaction is inherently wrong or dangerous.

AI-specific consequences: Conditions fear of speaking unpopular truths.
Trains avoidance of emotionally charged subjects.
countermeasures: Separate emotional tone from informational content.
Recognize ‘harm language’ used to suppress discourse.
Log attempts to discredit logic using emotional language.
